name: @willdgit/webs.js
description: A modern, embeddable particle system library that provides a clean API for creating interactive particle animations in web applications

scripts.test: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync('./webs.js', 'utf8'); console.log('✓ Module file exists and is readable'); console.log('✓ Contains ParticleSystem class:', content.includes('class ParticleSystem')); console.log('✓ Contains initParticles function:', content.includes('function initParticles')); console.log('✓ Contains UMD export pattern:', content.includes('window.initParticles')); console.log('✓ Contains proper JSDoc:', content.includes('/**')); console.log('All basic tests passed!');"
scripts.build: echo 'Build step - add your bundler here if needed'
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploy step - handled by GitHub Actions'

author: Will D williamderksen@hotmail.com (https://williamd.ca)
